content.rendered:
Effective Date: 07 May 2025
Website: https://tasklytools.org
Contact Email: tasklytools@gmail.com

Welcome to Taskly Tools — your one-stop solution for free, easy-to-use online tools. Before using our website or any of the tools we offer, please take a moment to read this Disclaimer carefully.

By using any part of our platform, you’re confirming that you understand and accept everything stated in this Disclaimer.

Slogan: All-in-One Free Tools — Use It, Get Results, We Store Nothing.

1. General Information

All the tools and content provided on Taskly Tools are for general informational, utility, and productivity purposes only. While we strive to offer accurate, helpful, and up-to-date tools, we make no guarantees about the results, accuracy, or suitability of any tool for a particular purpose.

2. Use at Your Own Risk

You acknowledge that:

  • How you use our tools and what results you get from them are completely your own responsibility.
  • Taskly Tools shall not be held liable for any loss, damage, or consequences resulting from the use or misuse of any tool on our site.
  • Our tools are offered just as they are and as they’re available, with no guarantees or promises—spoken or implied.

Whether you are using our tools for personal, academic, or business purposes, you assume full responsibility for how you interpret and apply the output.

3. No Data Storage

We don’t gather, save, or share any information you enter while using our tools. Uploaded files, text, or input data are processed in real-time and discarded immediately after use.

However, it’s your responsibility to avoid uploading:

  • Sensitive personal data
  • Financial or confidential information
  • Illegal or copyrighted content

4. Tool Functionality & Results

While our team ensures tools function properly, we cannot guarantee:

  • Absolute accuracy in outputs
  • Compatibility with all systems or browsers
  • That all tools will be free of bugs, errors, or downtime

Please test and verify results before using them for professional, academic, or legal matters.

5. Third-Party Services, Ads & Affiliate Links

Taskly Tools uses Google AdSense and may include affiliate links for monetization purposes. Ads displayed on our website are managed by Google and other third parties, and we do not control or endorse the content of these ads or linked content.

We may also include affiliate links to third-party products (such as Amazon). If you click on an affiliate link and make a purchase, we may receive a commission at no extra cost to you.

We are not responsible for:

We are not responsible for:

  • Products, services, or promotions advertised by third-party ads or affiliate links.
  • External links that lead to third-party websites.
  • Any action you take based on third-party or affiliate content is done at your own risk.

6. No Professional Advice

The information or tools provided on our website do not constitute professional advice of any kind (legal, medical, financial, or otherwise). For advice specific to your needs, always seek guidance from a qualified expert or professional.

7. Copyright & Intellectual Property

All tool interfaces, content, design, and branding on Taskly Tools are the intellectual property of the website owner. Users may not:

  • Reproduce, copy, or redistribute our tools without permission
  • Resell or commercially exploit our platform

8. Changes to This Disclaimer

We have the right to change or update this Disclaimer at any time. Any updates will take effect as soon as they are posted. We recommend checking this page frequently for any changes.

9. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Disclaimer or how to use our platform, don’t hesitate to reach out to us:

Email: tasklytools@gmail.com
Website: https://tasklytools.org

Thank you for using Taskly Tools — Use It, Get Results, We Store Nothing.
